Functions
misc_fnc_actionDropAllWeapons

Throw all weapons of a unit in randomly in front of him with some animation and then launch surrender action Added a random small sleep in case it is applied on a large it will appear more not natural.

Parameters: _unit

_unit

Unit Infantry
